Comparing Properties

In the application, you can compare the properties of two items of the same type, two revisions of the same item, or two revisions of the same folder.

To compare the properties of two items of the same type:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select a component tab from the upper pane. This action displays the component menu item on the menu bar.

  3. Select two items from the upper pane.

  4. Do one of the following:

    • Click the Compare Properties button on the toolbar.

    • Select Compare Properties from the component menu or context menu.

    The <item type> Compare dialog opens, allowing you to review the two sets of properties side-by-side. Differences are marked in boldface type.

To compare the properties of two revisions of the same item:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select a component tab from the upper pane. This action displays the component menu item on the menu bar.

  3. Select an item from the upper pane.

  4. Select the History tab.

  5. Select the two item revisions you want to compare.

  6. Do one of the following:

    • Click the Compare Properties button on the toolbar.

    • Right-click the selected items in the History list and select Compare Properties.

    The <item type> Compare dialog opens, allowing you to review the two item revisions side-by-side. Differences are marked in boldface type.

To compare the properties of two revisions of the same folder:

  1. Select the folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select Properties from the Folder or context menu.

  3. Select the History tab. (This tab is available only if you have the access rights required to allow you to see the folder history.)

  4. Select the two revisions to be compared from the History list.

  5. Do one of the following:

    • Click the Compare Properties button on the toolbar.

    • Right-click the selected items in the History list and select Compare Properties.

    The <item type> Compare dialog opens, allowing you to review the two revisions side-by-side. Differences are marked in boldface type.

Note: Folder and item revisions can also be compared by an administrator using the View Comparison utility or the View Manager to compare and merge views.
